header.title:
Everything a startup needs,
for 0% equity.
header.intro: Oswald Labs Accelerator is a free, remote, global support program for early-stage startups building for the next billion users. The program is based out of Enschede, the Netherlands, but is open to startups worldwide.

features.title: How it works
features.intro:
We've partnered with the most innovative companies across the globe to bring you the best advice, mentorship, services, resources, and investments — all for free.

We select up to 8 startups every batch, and help them accelerate their growth for six months.

list.title: Legal support
list.intro: Hiring professional lawyers is expensive. So you don't have to. Get free legal consultations for your startup, patent and IP support, and one-on-one meetings.

list.title: Office space
list.intro: Get a rented office space or access to coworking spaces in your city for free. Build your team, work unlimited hours, and have a legal office address.

list.title: Business development
list.intro: One-on-one meetings for strategy and scalability with business development experts from around the world. Up to two hours per week.

list.title: Technology support
list.intro: Free consultations and pro-bono development from some of the leading digital studios to help improve your technology stack and user experience.

list.title: Research & testing
list.intro: Work with universities, NGOs, and professional user experience and testing organizations to get feedback and R&D support before you launch.

list.title: And more
list.intro: Free email hosting on your custom domain. Free marketing consultations. Licenses to enterprise software. There’s more from where these are from.

deals.title: Deals & perks
deals.intro: Our accelerator companies get access to exclusive perks, deals, and offers from our partners.

list.title: $5000 Agastya Credits
list.intro: Get $5,000 in credits to use on the Oswald Labs Platform and Agastya.

list.title: $5000 AWS Credits
list.intro: Host your cloud infrastructure on Amazon Web Services and get $5,000 in credits.

list.title: $5000 AWS Business Support
list.intro: 24x7 technical support via email/chat/phone and more for 1 year.

list.title: $600 Business Essentials
list.intro: Credits for online training to develop cloud adoption for your businesses.

list.title: $600 Technical Essentials
list.intro: Credits for hands-on labs and online training on building an AWS stack.

list.title: $80 AWS Self-paced Labs
list.intro: Step-by-step instructions to try with technology in a practice environment.

list.title: 100% Free Unloq 2FA
list.intro: Completely free two-factor authentication as a service from Unloq.

list.title: 50% off on merch
list.intro: Half-off on customized logo apparel and products for your startup.
